column4: that is a setting in compiz. the desktop can flip as on a cube when you mouse to the edge. it can be turned off.
where is the mouse edge flip ?
it is not under the animations plugin, it is under the desktop cube plugin
I think it is on the second tab? go there and tell me what you see
i searched for screen in the filter
I finally remember! -  Rotate Cube in the Desktop section of CCSM. On the General tab uncheck the box marked "Edge Flip Pointer".
go to  Rotate Cube in the Desktop section of CCSM. On the General tab uncheck the box marked "Edge Flip Pointer".
i just changed the desktop to kwin and back to compiz, that didnt have any effect
is it ok to just change to kwin and then back to compiz? does that restart compiz?
i m using emerald on compiz
i did that my mouse still goes below the screen to open desktop
so the changes you make in the settings manager have no effect?
they do, but the unchecking those boxes did not have any effect
